name: Deathculator
description:
GAME DEVELOPED BY CALCULATOR BOYS
CONTROLS:
WASD - Basic movement
Space - Jump
Right click - Grapple hook (slightly broken, Texas instruments has to patch that one)
Left click - SHOOT!
Shift - Dash
F - Punch/Wall jump

FPS shooter game made for the Florida Poly Media Club Respawn Game Jam
Fall 2022

Developed by Michael Giraldo, Mariano Contreras and Logan Spencer.
Michael Giraldo - Programmer, Models, Level design and partial sound design.
Mariano Contreras - Level design, Music and sound design
Logan Spencer - Level design, asset/texture design, art lead.
